info.title: AuthorizationManagementClient
info.description: Role based access control provides you a way to apply granular level policy administration down to individual resources or resource groups. These operations enable you to manage role assignments. A role assignment grants access to Azure Active Directory users.

get.description: Get the specified role assignment schedule for a resource scope

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role assignment schedule.

parameters.name: roleAssignmentScheduleName
parameters.description: The name (guid) of the role assignment schedule to get.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the role assignment schedule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets role assignment schedules for a resource scope.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role assignments schedules.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all role assignment schedules at or above the scope. Use $filter=principalId eq {id} to return all role assignment schedules at, above or below the scope for the specified principal. Use $filter=asRequestor() to return all role assignment schedules requested by the current user. Use $filter=asTarget() to return all role assignment schedules created for the current user.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of role assignments schedules.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

principalId.description: Returns role assignment schedule of the specific principal.

roleDefinitionId.description: Returns role assignment schedule of the specific role definition.

status.description: Returns role assignment schedule instances of the specific status.

principalType.description: The principal type of the assigned principal ID.

roleAssignmentScheduleRequestId.description: The id of roleAssignmentScheduleRequest used to create this roleAssignmentSchedule

linkedRoleEligibilityScheduleId.description: The id of roleEligibilitySchedule used to activated this roleAssignmentSchedule

assignmentType.description: Assignment type of the role assignment schedule

memberType.description: Membership type of the role assignment schedule

status.description: The status of the role assignment schedule.

startDateTime.description: Start DateTime when role assignment schedule

endDateTime.description: End DateTime when role assignment schedule

condition.description: The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase 'foo_storage_container'

conditionVersion.description: Version of the condition. Currently accepted value is '2.0'

createdOn.description: DateTime when role assignment schedule was created

updatedOn.description: DateTime when role assignment schedule was modified

RoleAssignmentScheduleProperties.description: Role assignment schedule properties with scope.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

RoleAssignmentScheduleListResult.description: Role assignment schedule list operation result.

CloudError.description: An error response from the service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the service.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.
